actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore the provisions thereunder providing for rounding of benefits to the law as in effect immediately before the enactment of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that maximum benefit amounts and primary insurance amounts which are not multiples of $0.10 shall be raised to the next higher multiple of $0.10. (Currently, title II benefits are rounded to the next lower multiple of $0.10.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to restore the provisions thereunder providing for rounding of benefits to the law as in effect immediately before the enactment of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.
